business_model.rationale: ADHD users need to experience adaptive focus patterns before committing to subscription. Freemium allows immediate value demonstration while AI coaching and advanced features justify premium upgrade.

features: Simple visual task mapping (3 active projects)
free_tier.purpose: Demonstrate core ADHD-adaptive concepts and allow users to experience visual workflow benefits before upgrade decision

monthly_subscription.positioning: Premium ADHD productivity with advanced AI coaching
monthly_subscription.target_market: Working professionals with ADHD seeking specialized executive function support

annual_subscription.positioning: Best value for long-term ADHD pattern learning and optimization

conversion_tactics: Progressive AI learning showcases during trial
Gentle conversion reminders at days 14 and 19
Exit survey with discount offer for hesitant users

trigger_events: Attempt to access AI task matching
paywall_configuration.presentation_style: Modal with clear value proposition and ADHD-specific benefits
dismissal_rules: Always dismissible with visible X button
No forced loops or recurring blocks

churn_prevention: Usage pattern analysis with re-engagement prompts
Temporary discount offers for lapsed users
Exit survey with immediate issue resolution
winback_campaigns: Pattern data preservation during inactive periods

target_metrics.trial_conversion_rate: 22% (above industry average due to ADHD-specific value)

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: 21-day trial converts better than 7-day for ADHD users due to habit formation needs
pricing_experiments.test_description: A/B test 21-day vs 14-day vs 7-day trial periods measuring conversion rate and retention
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: Higher trial-to-paid conversion and 6-month retention rate

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: AI coaching value justifies premium pricing in $7-9 range for ADHD market
pricing_experiments.test_description: Price testing between $6.99, $7.99, and $8.99 monthly pricing with value messaging
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: Optimal revenue per user without significant conversion impact

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: Family sharing feature increases annual subscription preference
pricing_experiments.test_description: Test family plan positioning and pricing impact on annual vs monthly choice
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: Increased annual subscription rate and higher lifetime value per user
